thread.title: JAL Launches Online booking Service for Japan TravelersTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: JAL Launches Online booking Service for Japan TravelersTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: JAL Launches Online booking Service for Japan TravelersTravelandtourworld.com
text:
JAL launches Online booking service facilities for passengers Published on : Monday, July 6, 2015
Japan Airlines (JAL) teams up with numbers of popular hotel reservation, car rental,local tour and Wi-Fi service providers to introduce travelers with more options of convenience and rewardful online booking services on JAL’s global website.
On top of the ticket purchase, travelers can also book hotel, car and bus tour on JAL’s website. To assist travelers to plan for their trip easier and have more enjoyable travel experiences in Japan, JAL has increased more categories of online booking services thanks to the collaboration with tour company – “Veltra” and Wi-Fi router rental service provider – “Vision”. Also, “Hotels.com”, “Hertz” and “NISSAN Rent a Car” are added to the existing categories of Hotels and Car Rental services respectively.
New Online Booking Service Partners (by category)
l Hotel Reservations
Hotels.com - World’s leading hotel booking website with more than 510,000 properties worldwide
l Car Rental
Hertz - Global car rental company with around 10,300 service points worldwide, providing car rental service in Japan market in cooperation with “TOYOTA Rent a Car”
NISSAN Rent a Car - Providing car rental service 370 (as of August 2014) service points in Japan
l Tour
VELTRA - Specialized online booking provider of over 1,600 exciting tours and activities all over Japan including Maiko and Geisha tours in Kyoto, Mt. Fuji tours and beautiful beach tours in Okinawa
l Wi-Fi
Free Wi-Fi Service - Wi-Fi spots provided by “NTT East” and “Wire & Wireless (Wi2)”, offering free access ID/password to travelers to Japan by JAL flights
NINJA WiFi -Providing rental service of Wi-Fi router used within Japan, exlcusive 10% discount offered to JAL site users
